name: DeNiX General Handbrake Flow Intel  AV1/HEVC with DoVi CPU transcoding
description: DeNiX General Handbrake Flow Intel  AV1/HEVC with DoVi CPU transcoding

flowPlugins.name:
There is a 3rd row of encoder blocks now available. When u dont use QSV, u can now disable all QSV blocks. Enable the custom blocks. Here you can paste the presets that i have shared, or u can use ur own preset. 
Paste the content of your JSON file inside the encoder blocks.

If you also dont want to reprocess your hevc files, then u can connect the output of the AV1 codec check above this one and it will skip the video processing of AV1 and HEVC files. But will still do the audio and subtitle handling.

The left tree is for AV1 encoding where dovi (with HDR/HDR10 Hybrid) files will be encoded to AV1.. 
the right tree is for HEVC encoding, where all related files will be HEVC encoded.. 
You need to switch the output of the check video codec to the tree you prefer.

The left tree is for AV1 encoding where dovi (with HDR/HDR10 Hybrid) files will be encoded to AV1.. 
the right tree is for HEVC encoding, where all related files will be HEVC encoded.. 
You need to switch the output of the check video codec to the tree you prefer.
Check File Name Includes anything HDR10+ related
Check File Name Includes anything DoVi related
Check File Name Includes anything HDR10+ related (these are Hybrids)

inputsDB.jsonPreset:
{
  "PresetList": [
    {
      "AlignAVStart": false,
      "AudioCopyMask": [
        "copy:aac",
        "copy:ac3",
        "copy:eac3",
        "copy:truehd",
        "copy:dts",
        "copy:dtshd",
        "copy:mp2",
        "copy:mp3",
        "copy:flac",
        "copy:opus"
      ],
      "AudioEncoderFallback": "none",
      "AudioLanguageList": [
        "any"
      ],
      "AudioList": [
        {
          "AudioBitrate": 160,
          "AudioCompressionLevel": 0,
          "AudioEncoder": "copy",
          "AudioMixdown": "stereo",
          "AudioNormalizeMixLevel": false,
          "AudioSamplerate": "auto",
          "AudioTrackQualityEnable": false,
          "AudioTrackQuality": -1,
          "AudioTrackGainSlider": 0,
          "AudioTrackDRCSlider": 0
        }
      ],
      "AudioSecondaryEncoderMode": true,
      "AudioTrackSelectionBehavior": "all",
      "ChapterMarkers": true,
      "ChildrenArray": [],
      "Default": false,
      "FileFormat": "av_mkv",
      "Folder": false,
      "FolderOpen": false,
      "Optimize": false,
      "Mp4iPodCompatible": false,
      "PictureCropMode": 0,
      "PictureBottomCrop": 0,
      "PictureLeftCrop": 0,
      "PictureRightCrop": 0,
      "PictureTopCrop": 0,
      "PictureDARWidth": 3840,
      "PictureDeblockPreset": "off",
      "PictureDeblockTune": "medium",
      "PictureDeblockCustom": "strength=strong:thresh=20:blocksize=8",
      "PictureDeinterlaceFilter": "off",
      "PictureCombDetectPreset": "off",
      "PictureCombDetectCustom": "",
      "PictureDeinterlaceCustom": "",
      "PictureDenoiseCustom": "",
      "PictureDenoiseFilter": "off",
      "PictureSharpenCustom": "",
      "PictureSharpenFilter": "off",
      "PictureSharpenPreset": "medium",
      "PictureSharpenTune": "none",
      "PictureDetelecine": "off",
      "PictureDetelecineCustom": "",
      "PictureColorspacePreset": "off",
      "PictureColorspaceCustom": "",
      "PictureChromaSmoothPreset": "off",
      "PictureChromaSmoothTune": "none",
      "PictureChromaSmoothCustom": "",
      "PictureItuPAR": false,
      "PictureKeepRatio": true,
      "PicturePAR": "auto",
      "PicturePARWidth": 1,
      "PicturePARHeight": 1,
      "PictureUseMaximumSize": true,
      "PictureAllowUpscaling": false,
      "PictureForceHeight": 0,
      "PictureForceWidth": 0,
      "PicturePadMode": "none",
      "PicturePadTop": 0,
      "PicturePadBottom": 0,
      "PicturePadLeft": 0,
      "PicturePadRight": 0,
      "PresetName": "qsv_av1_10bit",
      "Type": 1,
      "SubtitleAddCC": true,
      "SubtitleAddForeignAudioSearch": false,
      "SubtitleAddForeignAudioSubtitle": false,
      "SubtitleBurnBehavior": "none",
      "SubtitleBurnBDSub": false,
      "SubtitleBurnDVDSub": false,
      "SubtitleLanguageList": [
        "any"
      ],
      "SubtitleTrackSelectionBehavior": "all",
      "VideoAvgBitrate": 0,
      "VideoColorMatrixCode": 0,
      "VideoEncoder": "qsv_h265_10bit",
      "VideoFramerateMode": "vfr",
      "VideoGrayScale": false,
      "VideoHWDecode": 1,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      "VideoScaler": "swscale",
      "VideoPreset": "quality",

flowPlugins.name: All Stereo sound to AAC if not here create 2.0 track

⚠Edit your API keys and URL's.⚠You can delete this comment afterwards.⚠
enter the host addresses without http(s)://

Open all these plugins and set ur preferences accordingly.  All of these are classic plugins, U can find them in the plugin catalog. If you need help with any of the options inside a plugin go to the right of the plugin and click on the ? mark. (Yes it is actually an button 🤪) That will answer all your questions.
Check File Name Includes anything DoVi related
❗❗This is not a 100% guarantee that it will catch all DoVi and HDR10+ files. ❗❗Watch your filenames and adjust accordingly all the filters. ❗❗These are based on Sonarr / Radarr naming ❗❗

❗❗❗❗❗This flow is intended to use with AV1 and or you can use it with the HEVC presets as well, enabled HEVC filters, if you if you disable them any issues or quality issues i will not support. ❗❗❗❗❗If you disable the HEVC any hevc file will be processed❗❗❗❗❗ Use it with caution and only if you know what you are doing❗❗❗❗❗
✅Normal HDR/HDR10 content ✅ shouldn't have any issues with handbrake. ✅

❗❗❗❗❗If you are using Libx265 or the SVT-AV1 preset you can remove the filters if you want, those two encoders are capable of doing HDR10+ and DoVi, However HDR10+ will not work in AV1❗❗ Thats a AV1 limitation ❗❗before you do transcode HDR10+ and DoVi files go to: https://discord.com/channels/623392507828371476/1318644299629461504 --❗❗❗❗❗And read it before you even remove those filters and touch 4K content ❗❗❗❗❗you have been warned.❗❗❗❗❗
⚠After editing all options in all the plugins, you can safely delete all these blue comment balloons. ⚠ Or u can keep them as future reference so you still know what the flow does.⚠
This is the filter for HEVC files, here we will check the bitrate of the video file, if its below a certain threshold, we skip the encoding process and go to Audio, Subs handling.
The upper API key, in Supersnellehenks plugin keep native audio, is your tmdb api-key.

Default enabled ones are HEVC QSV the Disabled ones are AV1 QSV if wanna do av1 disable all hevc and enable all av1 ones. If you want to do another encoder like CPU NVIDIA AMD, then in all these green encoder blocks paste your preferred handbrake json inside them :) you can find them with in the help thread where you got this thread from :)

These 3 disabled plugins are normally not needed with handbrake, i disabled them by default to save unnecessary CPU/IO/NETWORK cycles , if you ever decide to switch from handbrake to FFMPEG you need to enable these to prevent errors.

As from now on, i will maintain this flow, this is defaulted by QSV, with CPU encoding for DoVi and HDR10+ content. 
if you want to use other hardware then QSV then u need to change the handbrake presets in the encoder blocks to the right. (https://discord.com/channels/623392507828371476/1332819192637947934) in this thread there are the CPU, NVIDIA, AMD presets available. You can get them there, or of course create your own preset from the gui version of handbrake. It consumes to much time, to make all the same changes to 9 different flows. If you need help with anything you can drop your help request in: (https://discord.com/channels/623392507828371476/1353809945568612526) Thats the help thread in the official discord channel. Enjoy.
If u do not want to process ur Dolby Vision or HDR10+ content. you can disable the 3 plugins above and enable the set original file plugin to only process audio and subtitles.
